revertSimilarList.reason: Both instruct to provide diary to females with menstruation/periods and submit to staff for review
revertSimilarList.revertText: Please provide this diary to female participants who have menstrual periods. Submit this diary to the research staff so they can check it at each research visit.

revertSimilarList.reason: Both ask about average menstrual cycle length in the 6 months before study participation
revertSimilarList.revertText: During the 6 months before starting participation in this study, how long did your menstrual cycle last on average?

revertSimilarList.reason: Both request recording days between menstrual periods with same format
revertSimilarList.revertText: Please record the approximate number of days from the start of one menstrual period to the start of the next menstrual period here: ______________ days

revertSimilarList.reason: Both describe same non-applicability criteria with slight wording differences
revertSimilarList.revertText: Not applicable if you have not had menstrual cycles with bleeding in the past 6 months, or if your first menstrual cycle began during the study

revertSimilarList.reason: Both ask for first menstrual cycle date with same format and alternatives
revertSimilarList.revertText: Start date of first menstrual cycle: DD / MMM / YYYY__ If you cannot remember the date, please fill in the month/year or starting age. _______ (age).

revertSimilarList.reason: Both provide instructions to record period start/end dates
revertSimilarList.revertText: Instructions: Please record the start and end dates of your period (bleeding days) each time during your menstrual cycle.

revertSimilarList.reason: Same request with slight wording difference
Same request with slight wording difference
Same version and date with slight format difference
Same page numbering with slight format difference

translatedList: 月経のある女性参加者にこの日記を提供してください。各研究訪問時にスタッフが確認できるよう、この日記を研究スタッフに提出してください。
この研究への参加を始める前の6ヶ月間で、平均してあなたの月経周期はどのくらい続きましたか？
ある月経期間の開始から次の月経期間の開始までのおおよその日数をここに記録してください：______________ 日
または以下にチェック
過去6ヶ月間に出血を含む月経周期がなかった場合、または最初の月経周期が研究中に始まった場合は該当なし
最初の月経周期の開始日：DD / MMM / YYYY__ 日付を思い出せない場合は、月/年または開始年齢を記入してください。_______ （年齢）。
指示：月経周期内の生理（出血日）の開始日と終了日を毎回記録してください。
